Interrupts.Name: Iron Coffin
Interrupts.Effects: The coffin breaks open. The [name] becomes intangible until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Obliterate Aether
Effects: Deals bonus damage to characters at 50% hp or lower.
Instead of dealing damage, character targeted sacrifices hp equal to the damage that would have been dealt. If a character is at 1 hp, they are instead instantly defeated.
